comments:
Description:
Fail to deploy chart runtime in WebSphere6.1/Weblogic9.2
Build number:2.2.1.v200708170943

Steps to reproduce:
1. Deploy chart-viewer-sample.war to WebSphere6.1
2. Visit index.jsp page

Expected result:
Display three charts.

Actual result:
JSP Processing Error.

Error log:
HTTP Error Code:   500

Error Message:

JSPG0227E: Exception caught while translating /index.jsp:  
/index.jsp(15,1) --> JSPG0123E: Unable to locate tag attribute info for tag attribute SampleBar.chart.

Root Cause:

com.ibm.ws.jsp.translator.JspTranslationException: JSPG0227E: Exception caught while translating /index.jsp:  
/index.jsp(15,1) --> JSPG0123E: Unable to locate tag attribute info for tag attribute SampleBar.chart.
	at com.ibm.ws.jsp.translator.visitor.validator.ValidateVisitor.validateCustomTagAttributeValues(ValidateVisitor.java:1649)

Check in build2.3.0.v20071113
See this error message:
Error 500: org.eclipse.birt.chart.model.impl.ChartWithAxesImpl (initialization failure).

If I set class loader order in Manage Module to application first, I will see blank page.
Wrong assignment to M3, setting back to 2.3.0

Fixed as Bug 193892.
Please make sure parent-last classloading order for chart viewer package.

Test in build 2.3.0.v20071214.

Still fail to display chart and only display blank page, I have removed xerces jar and set class loader as application first.

traces.message: JSPG0227E: Exception caught while translating /index.jsp:   /index.jsp(15,1) --> JSPG0123E: Unable to locate tag attribute info for tag attribute SampleBar.chart.
